error.message: Configuration entity must define a `config_export` key. See https://www.drupal.org/node/2481909

Parameter $event of method Drupal\exception_mailer\Subscribers\ExceptionEventSubscriber::onException() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ExceptionEvent instead
Call to deprecated method getException() of class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseForExceptionEvent: since Symfony 4.4, use getThrowable instead
Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
